issue.title: [R] Update tests for extracting components from date32 objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13959](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13959). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The R tests implemented in the PR which adds C++ functionality for extracting components from date32 objects don't compare Arrow dplyr code with R dplyr code - these tests should be updated to do so.

https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/4b5ed4eb5583cf24d8daff05a865c8d1cb616576#diff-1cddae31f0151681f8b551bf834f1b9fb5ebac00006061521efc70084b5057f7

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13959?focusedCommentId=17415453) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11119
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11119>
